Class GLFWWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • vine.platform.lwjgl3.GLFWWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Window

    public final class GLFWWindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements Window
    Lwjgl, Open-GL Desktop platform implementation of Window adapter.

    Steffen
